title: Navigating Miscarriage - Our Pregnancy Loss Story
description: A heavier episode than usual, Jordan opens up about her journey with pregnancy and loss in hopes of shedding light on what miscarriage is like, how we as women can better support one another through grief like this, and ways to break the stigma and change the way society views this topic.
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
content:encoded: A heavier episode than usual, Jordan opens up about her journey with pregnancy and loss in hopes of shedding light on what miscarriage is like, how we as women can better support one another through grief like this, and ways to break the stigma and change the way society views this topic.
